descriptions.title: Consecration of Samaya-substances
descriptions.content:
Description

For example, the transformation of the five meats and five nectars into amṛta. See also Five meats and five nectars (alchemical ritual); Consecration of nectar pills

Example Texts

  • Rakta’i dam rdzas sgrub tshul gyi cho ga 
  • Tsong kha pa la brten pa’i dam rdzas ril bu sgrub chog,
  • Bka’ ‘dus chos kyi rgya mtsho’i bdud rtsi’i sgrub thabs
